description.narrative: (Tanzania): The Tanzania Media and Civil Society Strengthening activity, known locally as Boresha Habari ("Better News"), will utilize FY 2020 resources to promote core U.S. Government values such as free speech, free association, and good governance. FY 2020 resources will provide technical assistance to partner organizations and individuals to develop their resilience to closing space dynamics and restrictions on freedom of expression. The activity will provide training and convene fora to improve the organizational capacity and financial viability of community radio stations while strengthening civil society's ability to effectively work with the media to improve their public messaging around key issues related to health, economic growth, agriculture, civic education, and human rights. .
